com.tiemens.secretshare.math

Class BigRational

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Number
      • com.tiemens.secretshare.math.BigRational
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<BigRational>

    public class BigRational
extends java.lang.Number
implements java.lang.Comparable<BigRational>
    Immutable, arbitrary-precision signed rational numbers. Invariants ---------- o GCD(numerator, denominator) = 1, i.e., rational number is in reduced form o denominator >= 1, i.e., the denominator is always a positive integer o BigRational(0,1) is the unique representation of zero
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
